name: 狂愛イノセンス -The Broken Platonic
name_original: 狂愛イノセンス -The Broken Platonic
description:
I can't *** with anyone but you

■Story

One day in midsummer, when it's hot as hell and the cicadas are noisy.
Iona, who has lost a lot of money playing pachinko, got visited by her long-lost little sister. The reunion after ten years is not an emotional one: the eldest brother, Riku, has stabbed their father.

As she confronts her sisters, she begins to realise that they remind her of Riku.
Then she realises that she loved Riku.

Pure love over ten years.
This time, let's start a moral love with you in a kind world.

■Characters


◇Akagisawa Iona
”No... You never be a pachinko-holic...“

A self-indulgent 25-year-old woman whose hobbies are gaming and gambling, and running something like a candy shop in the countryside.
Her family is so rich that she has no trouble to live, and she has a lot of free time on her hands.



◇Aoekoji Ayana
“Iona-chan, you're not good at gambling. You shouldn't do that. Definitely.”

Iona's little sister. She is 14 years old, although her mental age and height are higher.
She was separated from Iona 10 years ago, but came to visit her from far because of an incident involving her brother.



◇Aoekoji Mikaru
“Iona-san sometimes says hard to know.”

A girl who came to visit Iona with Ayana.
She is understanding, but also a mysterious, and slightly father complex.



◇Aoekoji Riku
“I've thought you'll be mad definitely, Iona.”

Iona's elder brother, who was separated from her 10 years ago.
They are not related by blood as they are step-children who became siblings when their parents remarried, and their birthdays are one month apart.
He stabbed Iona's father and was arrested.



◇Dr. Momo-chan
“Having both ones, that seems strong, you know?”

A cosmetic surgeon who injected silicon only in upper body. Highly educated but a self-confessed pervert.
A family affair with Iona and have a good friendship.


  • Genre: Otome game with heavy love overall
  • Play time: 5-6 hours for all EDs confirmed.
  • Number of endings: 3 + after story
